#### About 

This web application uses a decision-tree health economics models to conduct a cost-utility analysis of prevention interventions in case
of acute exposure to air pollution in mild asthma. 

Please refer to the manuscript for more details on the structure of the model and results.


#### Citation

Mohammadi T, Sadatsafavi M, Carlsten C. The economics of precision health: preventing air pollution-induced exacerbation in asthma. ERJ open research. 2021 Jan 1;7(1). doi:[10.1183/23120541.00790-2020](https://doi.org/10.1183/23120541.00790-2020)
